attributes.action: Change the way things are done regarding sanitary products
attributes.additional_details: Women do not choose to have a period once a month so they should not have to pay for the products/items that can help them during this time
attributes.background: Make sanitary products free to all! Women dont choose to have a period

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Fund free period pads
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733282
